definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[תמר]] (√of foll.; cf. perh. Ar. 0itma0’ar=a be erect, stiff (e.g. of lance), so Buhl:13, who derives thence [[תמר]] palm-tree, and also [[תִּימָרָה]], NH [[תִּמָּרָה]] column of smoke, NH [[תִּמּוּר]] rising motion, etc., but these denom. from [[תָּמָר]] Levy:NHWB Buhl:14; cf. Ar. tamrun date, Eth. tamr: id., tamart: date-palm, Aram. [[תַּמְרָא]], tmarto0 date-palm, NH [[תָּמָר]] date (-palm))).
